overview: Seri, an introvert with an expressionless face, is always teased by children because of her mother who married in Vietnam. However, my dream is to become a famous golfer like Pak Se-ri and be recognized by people. On the other hand, she is the daughter of a Filipino illegal immigrant who is bright and confident on the outside, and she dreams of living legally with a resident registration card like a Korean.
title: Seri & Harr
